com.adobe.cq.social.commons.comments.listing

Interface CommentSocialComponentListProvider


  • public interface CommentSocialComponentListProvider
    An interface that defines comment list providers that can retrieve a list of comments based on a specific set of constraints like query/sort/resource type, etc.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean acceptQuery(QueryRequestInfo listInfo) 
      boolean checkResource(Resource commentCollectionResource, SocialUtils socialUtils)
      Allows a caller to determine whether this provider can retrieve the list of comments for the given resource.

      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSupportedResourceType() 

    • Method Detail

      • getCommentSocialComponentList

        <C extends Comment,T extends CommentCollectionConfiguration> CommentSocialComponentList getCommentSocialComponentList(CommentCollection<C,T> commentCollection,
                                                                                                                      QueryRequestInfo listInfo,
                                                                                                                      ClientUtilities clientUtils)
        Type Parameters:
        C - comment
        T - CommentCollectionConfiguration
        Parameters:
        commentCollection - - the comment collection instance for which the list of comments is to be retrieved.
        listInfo - - parameters that define the list
        clientUtils - - an instance of ClientUtilities
        Returns:
        a CommentSocialComponentList that contains the list of comments retrieved

      • getCommentSocialComponentList

        <C extends Comment> CommentSocialComponentList getCommentSocialComponentList(C comment,
                                                                             QueryRequestInfo listInfo,
                                                                             ClientUtilities clientUtils)
        Type Parameters:
        C - comment
        Parameters:
        comment - - the comment instance for which the list of comments is to be retrieved.
        listInfo - - parameters that define the list
        clientUtils - - an instance of ClientUtilities
        Returns:
        a CommentSocialComponentList that contains the list of comments retrieved

      • checkResource

        boolean checkResource(Resource commentCollectionResource,
                      SocialUtils socialUtils)
        Allows a caller to determine whether this provider can retrieve the list of comments for the given resource.
        Parameters:
        commentCollectionResource - - the resource for which a list of comments is to be retrieved.
        socialUtils - - an instance of SocialUtils
        Returns:
        true if this provider can retrieve a list for the resource, false otherwise.

      • getSupportedResourceType

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSupportedResourceType()
        Returns:
        a list of resource types for which this provider can retrieve a list of comments for.

      • acceptQuery

        boolean acceptQuery(QueryRequestInfo listInfo)
        Parameters:
        listInfo - - the list parameters for which provider might have to retireve a list for
        Returns:
        true, if the provider can handle the constrains (like sort criteria, filter parameters) specified in the listInfo, false otherwise.
